prompt:
THEME: Neon Cyberpunk Metropolis

STYLE:
- Dark buildings with bright neon signs and holographic ads
- Rain-slicked surfaces, purple/cyan/pink color palette
- High-tech meets gritty urban decay
- Blade Runner / Ghost in the Shell aesthetic

ASSET DETAILS:
- Grass: FLAT metal floor tile only - dark metal grating with neon grid lines, no structures
- House: Compact apartment pod with neon trim, satellite dishes
- Shop: Ramen bar or tech shop with holographic menu, neon signs
- Park: Rooftop zen garden with holographic trees, meditation pods
- University: Massive corporate tower with data streams, antenna arrays
- Market: Night market with neon stalls, drone delivery, street food
